medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain for the last few days, initially crampy across the abdomen, localized to the right lower quadrant in the last 12 hours.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain started crampy in nature and has lasted for several days. In the last approximately 12 hours, the pain has localized to the right lower quadrant. No nausea or vomiting reported, no fevers or chills. The patient has tolerated normal oral intake throughout.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Mitral valve prolapse; previous tonsillectomy and breast biopsy.
